actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to provide that the Secretary of State, at the request of an individual issued a passport, not include in the passport the place of birth of such individual.

summary.text: States that, at the request of an individual issued a United States passport, the place of birth of such individual shall not be disclosed in the passport.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the Secretary of State, at the request of an individual issued a passport, not include in the passport the place of birth of such individual.
